title: On Turning Ten - complexity of speaker's attitude

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Collins uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complexity of the speaker’s attitude. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible interpretation. Select and use evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Collins uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complexity of the speaker’s attitude. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible interpretation. Select and use evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
